title: 如何关闭自带的防作弊
author: pikika
txt_content:
有大佬说mcbbs上边有怎么关防作弊，找了半天没有收获，大佬爱搭不理只能来这里发个帖子，希望不要沉，有人来帮忙。
话不多说，上图

文字信息
BoehMod Anticheat
You've been kicked for having modified files!
New update 0ut?
You can force-update from the options menu


翻译信息
波姆德背热


你因为修改文件被踢了！


是否有新的更新？


可以从“选项”菜单强制更新



百度基番不要介意


问题亟待解决，秋梨膏





image.png
(33.71 KB, 下载次数: 0)




下载附件


2020-4-28 21:10 上传








问题图

replies.author: 小张up
replies.txt_content:
删掉服务器里的anticheat系列删掉吧
我是瞎子，没看到你是mod端

replies.author: pikika
replies.txt_content: 顶自己的帖子，然后顺便还能做个任务，各位快些来帮我一把，金粒在召唤

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
你是服主的话，就删除BoehMod Anticheat这个插件吧
不是服主的话，不使用forge启动看看
还不行用这个客户端https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-869469-1-1.html

然后没开的您说的那个插件

找到服务端目录，有个plugins文件夹。查找boeh或者cheat关键词，找到后删除
模组核心吗
那在mods文件夹内找找这个文件，然后删除

spigot.yml给我，我帮你看看
如下
# This is the main configuration file for Spigot.
# As you can see, there's tons to configure. Some options may impact gameplay, so use
# with caution, and make sure you know what each option does before configuring.
# For a reference for any variable inside this file, check out the Spigot wiki at
# http://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/spigot-configuration/
# 
# If you need help with the configuration or have any questions related to Spigot,
# join us at the IRC or drop by our forums and leave a post.
# 
# IRC: #spigot @ irc.esper.net ( http://webchat.esper.net/?channel=spigot )
# Forums: http://www.spigotmc.org/forum/

config-version: 7
messages:
  whitelist: You are not whitelisted on this server!
  unknown-command: Unknown command. Type "/help" for help.
  server-full: The server is full!
  outdated-client: Outdated client! Please use {}
  outdated-server: Outdated server! I'm still on {}
  restart: Server is restarting
stats:
  disable-saving: false
  forced-stats: {}
commands:
  tab-complete: true
  log: true
settings:
  player-shuffle: 0
  late-bind: false
  sample-count: 12
  netty-threads: -1
  timeout-time: 90
  restart-on-crash: true
  restart-script: ./start.sh
  bungeecord: false
  fullMatchRate: 10
world-settings:
  default:
    verbose: false
    mob-spawn-range: 4
    nerf-spawner-mobs: false
    growth:
      cactus-modifier: 100
      cane-modifier: 100
      melon-modifier: 100
      mushroom-modifier: 100
      pumpkin-modifier: 100
      sapling-modifier: 100
      wheat-modifier: 100
